Qraft Data Description Process
Get Organized PDF File: data_description.pdf

Portfolio123

A stock/ETF screener & backtester with over 400 factors you can combine to aid in your universe selection.

Reference: https://www.portfolio123.com/

Morningstar

A classic stock data visualization service. With all the financial statements data you need in your research.

Reference: https://www.morningstar.com/

Kiwoom

Korea's best retail HTS in use as of now. With over 30% the market share. Is well known for its condition screener.

Reference: https://www.kiwoom.com/
